item.title: New Shadow The Hedgehog Trademark Quietly Registered by SEGA
item.content:encoded:
SEGA recently filed for a new trademark for Shadow the Hedgehog, sparking widespread speculation in the community.

Shadow the Hedgehog is one of the most popular characters from the franchise, and SEGA could be well on its way to using the character again in a new title. The last game featuring Shadow was Sonic x Shadow Generations, which sold over 1 million copies on launch day.

A New Shadow the Hedgehog Trademark Has Been Filed

Spotted by SonicCity, SEGA filed a new Shadow the Hedgehog trademark in September, which players can see in Japan’s public trademark repositories. The trademark is for clothing, toys, education, and more. However, further down in the filing, players will find home video game consoles and more. There is no official confirmation of a new Shadow the Hedgehog game, but many players have begun speculating that it could be a remake.

While we wait for some official announcement to arrive from SEGA, players can check out the latest multiplayer racing title from the series, Sonic Racing: CrossWorlds. It is a new title that features races across land, sea, air, and space, where players can use Travel Rings to transport themselves into new dimensions. The game features 24 tracks, and players can warp to 15 CrossWorlds with Travel Rings. It also featured 45 unique original vehicles, 70 different gadgets, and 23 iconic Sonic characters at launch, one of which is Shadow the Hedgehog.

In other news, earlier this year, SEGA accidentally made sales data for 11 major games public. What are your thoughts on SEGA filing for a new Shadow the Hedgehog trademark? Let us know through the official Insider Gaming forums discussion.

For more information from Insider Gaming, read about Battlefield 6 developers stating that servers “should be” ready to handle the influx of players at launch. Don’t forget to sign up for our weekly newsletter.

item.title: Today’s Wordle #1574: Hints And Answer For October 10, 2025
item.content:encoded:
Each day, Wordle asks players to guess a new five-letter word in six guesses or less. No matter your experience level, using today’s tips and strategies can help you solve the puzzle faster—if a bit of help is welcome. So, if you’ve found yourself stuck with today’s Wordle, don’t worry, below you’ll find some helpful hints and even the answer for Wordle Game #1574 for October 10, 2025.

To play today’s Wordle, head to the game’s website. If you just want to go right to today’s answer without any tips or tricks, you can click right here. If you’ve missed any days, check out our Wordle Answer Archive for every past answer.

IMPORTANT: The following information includes spoilers on today’s and yesterday’s editions of Wordle. If you don’t want the answer given to you, stop scrolling.

How To Play Wordle

Wordle is a simple but addictive word puzzle. Each day, players have to guess a five-letter word answer in no more than six attempts. After each guess:

  • Green letters are correct and in the right position.
  • Yellow letters are correct, but in the wrong position.
  • Gray letters are not in the word at all.

The goal is to guess the word in as few tries as possible. Daily puzzles keep players coming back for more, making it a fun brain exercise and a trending topic online.

Wordle can only be played on the New York Times website. There currently isn’t an app for you to download the official game.

Wordle Hints For Today, October 10, 2025

The Wordle answer for game #1574 is going to be a tough one, though it’s not the hardest word players have seen. According to the NY Times Wordle review, today’s answer takes an average of 4.6 guesses out of 6 to get. That makes it ever-so-slightly harder than October 8’s 4.3-guess average.

General Wordle Hints For October 10

Without giving today’s Wordle answer completely away, here are a few helpful hints for today to get you started:

  • Hint 1: This word contains two of the same vowel.
  • Hint 2: It both starts with L and ends with R.
  • Hint 3: It can refer to a simple machine.
  • Hint 4: It’s something you might pull to lift or move an object.

Use these clues to narrow down your guesses and increase your chances of solving Wordle #1574 for October 10, 2025

Starter Words For October 10, 2025

If you just want help getting started without having today’s Wordle answer given to you, there are a few starter words worth trying that will help you figure out some included letters. A few starter words that may help are:

  • CRANE
  • RIDER
  • LEMON

Today’s Wordle Answer For Game #1574 On October 10, 2025

If you’ve tried everything, including using the above hints, and are still stuck, you can find the answer to today’s Wordle below.

Answer: LEVER

If you solved today’s Wordle without our answer, congratulations! If not, take note of the best tips above for tomorrow’s puzzle, and check back daily for more hints.

Yesterday’s Wordle Answer

If you missed the previous game, here’s yesterday’s Wordle answer for Game #1573 on October 9, 2025:

Answer: HARDY

While not always the case, looking at previous words can sometimes give you insight into common patterns or letter usage in Wordle puzzles. Reminder, you can check out every past Wordle answer in our official archive.

When Is The Next Wordle Game After #1574?

Wordle games are updated daily at 12am or Midnight in your respective time zone. Information about the next game is often available in the hours before to give players a heads up. The game on October 11 will be Wordle Game #1575.

What Is Wordle?

Wordle is a daily word puzzle created by Josh Wardle. Initially developed as a prototype in 2013, it wasn’t fully released until 2021. The game tasks players with guessing a five-letter word in six tries or fewer, using hints from each attempt to narrow down the answer. Its straightforward concept, accessibility, and the thrill of solving a new puzzle each day helped it surge in popularity by late 2021. The success of Wordle inspired numerous spin-offs and social media challenges, leading to its acquisition by The New York Times in early 2022.

Need more help with other daily games? Let us know what games you’d like tips and clues for in the comments below.

item.title: Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 Announces New Content After Crossing 5 Million Units
item.content:encoded:
Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 has surpassed 5 million copies sold, and the devs are celebrating this milestone with a big content update.

Sandfall Interactive is Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 has won the hearts of players worldwide, becoming one of the highest-rated games of 2025 and a strong contender for Game of the Year. The game director also recently stated that Clair Obscur “is the franchise name” and Expedition 33 is definitely not the end of the franchise. Now, they have announced new content for Expedition 33, following their latest sales milestone.

Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 Will Get a New Playable Environment, New Enemies, And More

Sandfall Interactive is working on a massive new content update for all platforms that Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 is available on. This update introduces a new playable environment, taking the game’s characters on a journey to a brand-new location with fresh enemy encounters and more surprises and mysteries to unravel. Additionally, challenging new boss battles are arriving for late-game players to take on.

Moreover, players will be able to try out new costumes for each member of the Expedition. New text and UI game localizations into Czech, Ukrainian, Latin American Spanish, Turkish, Vietnamese, Thai, and Indonesian will also be available, bringing the total number of supported languages to 19. The developers have also promised that there is “more to come”.

Interestingly, along with the game reaching 5 million units sold, the original soundtrack, composed by Lorien Testard, has now surpassed 333 million track streams since its release.

In other news, the developers of Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 “will explore a Nintendo Switch 2 possibility. Additionally, Daredevil actor has promised to play the game. What are your thoughts on the upcoming content update for Clair Obscur: Expedition 33? Let us know through the official Insider Gaming forums discussion.

For more information from Insider Gaming, read about Battlefield 6’s destruction improving after dropping PS4 and Xbox One. Don’t forget to sign up for our weekly newsletter.

SUBSCRIBE to our newsletter to receive the latest news and exclusive leaks every week! No Spam.

item.title: Battlefield 6’s Destruction Improved After Dropping PS4 and Xbox One
item.content:encoded:
Battlefield 6’s destruction technology has received praise from all players, and it seems that dropping previous-gen consoles, the PlayStation 4 and Xbox One, was key in reaching that standard.

The developers of Battlefield 6 have elaborated on the destruction tech used in the game several times ahead of release. The title utilizes tactical destruction, which brings “unparalleled levels of freedom” to the game, and was inspired by the intimate destruction experience in Bad Company 2. Now, the developers have explained what it takes to achieve this level of destruction in BF6.

The ‘Magic Trick’ Behind Battlefield 6’s Destruction is Dropping Previous-Gen Consoles

During a new interview with Battlefield 6’s technical director, Christian Buhl, PC Gamer asked what the secret sauce was behind the game’s destruction system. Buhl revealed that “Maybe the only magic trick is that we’re not on the PS4 or Xbox One anymore.” This enabled developers to work with increased memory and CPU speed, which in turn improved overall performance. As the developers weren’t trying to optimize the “game to run on a PS4, for example.”

However, there was still a lot of work done towards Battlefield 6’s destruction after dropping previous-gen consoles. Buhl spoke about “testing destruction” and the different areas that need to be optimised. The technical director also talked about the Frostbite engine, which was built for Battlefield, and destruction, and “those pieces are core parts of the engine.” The developer concluded, stating,” I don’t think there was any magic bullet. It was just a lot of testing, a lot of iteration, a lot of work.”

In other news, Battlefield 6’s battle royale and multiplayer have the same destruction system. Additionally, only 12% of BF6 players give a damn about the new Portal mode. What are your thoughts on removing previous-generation consoles like Xbox One and PS4, which could help improve Battlefield 6’s destruction? Let us know through the official Insider Gaming forums discussion.

For more information from Insider Gaming, read about the Pokémon Legends: Z-A preload guide and file size. Don’t forget to sign up for our weekly newsletter.

item.title: Prism Runway Show Codes (October 2025)
item.content:encoded:
Do you aspire to one day walk the runway at Paris Fashion Week or showcase your ideas at the Met Gala? If yes, then Prism Runway Show might be the game that you’ve been searching for all your life. Prism Runway Show is all about the glitz and glam of the fashion world, with the gameplay primarily focused on creating spellbinding outfits good enough to impress the judges. 

With enjoyable gameplay elements like being able to walk the runway with your friends, Prism Runway Show will be a fun experience for anyone who has a keen sense of fashion and style. Whether you go down the punk route or take a more colorful approach, there are plenty of themes and styles for players to make use of. To help you out along the way, make use of some of these Prism Runway Show codes.

All New Prism Runway Show Codes

Expired Prism Runway Show Codes

As of the writing of this article, there are no expired Prism Runway Show codes. The only existing active code for the game is expected to expire soon. When this happens, this section of the page will be updated to reflect the change. Although there are currently not many active or expired codes, considering the amount of traction the game has gained in recent times, new codes are expected to be released by the developers shortly.

When new codes are released, whether on the game’s social media or on their Discord, this page will be updated immediately. This is why we recommend that all readers bookmark this page, so that when new codes do eventually drop, you’ll be able to access them all in one place. 

How to redeem Prism Runway Show codes

While Prism Runway Show can’t necessarily be classified as a hard game, the process to redeem codes in it is even easier. It’s as simple as navigating through the menus to the codes section and entering one of the active codes that we have listed above. For players who are new to the game or aren’t familiar with the Roblox ecosystem, though, here’s a step-by-step guide to redeeming Prism Runway Show codes:

  • Launch Roblox and open up Prism Runway Show
  • Click on the button with the three lines on it to open the menu
  • Go into the codes tab and input one of the active codes given above
  • Click the redeem button to receive your rewards

For more Roblox Guides and trending games, check out Weak Legacy 2 Codes, which is a hugely popular game now on Roblox.
